title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point earned for estimating the form of Lagrange error

1 point earned for reasoning

The fourth derivative of h is increasing on the interval 1≤x≤3, so  max 1.9≤x≤2 | h (4) (x) |= 584 9 .
